Html:
Is there a way how to change the language of a bibliography, so that some fill words (like "retrieved" for web resources) are shown in the correct document language (ASA style)?

 

Thanks!

No. After seeing the language issues with the styles which came with Word, I specifically choose to make BibWord styles to be in one language only.

Of course, as bibliographies tend to contain only limited 'fill words', you could easily go over the data element in the xslt and translate it yourself. It is probably done in less than 10 minutes.
